actions.name: Chain
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6 damage) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 17). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the giant can't use this attack on anyone else.

actions.name: Rock
entries: Ranged atk +9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6 damage) bludgeoning damage.
